entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Lambton Shores
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:55 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 2.
